simpleUIApp

Class Collision

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpleUIApp.Collision
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Collision
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class handles the collisions occurring during spaceships moves
    Author:
    Laura
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Collision()
      Create a "empty" collision, collision will be modify whenever a collision occurs

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void define(simpleUIApp.Planet obs, simpleUIApp.SpaceShip sp, simpleUIApp.SpaceShip origin)
      define is called when there is a collision, setting type and direction of the collision
      java.lang.String getType()
      getType() is actually only used to check if the collision is "empty"
      void handle(java.util.ArrayList<simpleUIApp.Planet> ListPlanets, simpleUIApp.SpaceShip origin)
      handles collision, depending on its type and direction, and finally sets the spaceship origin to the new appropriated location it also "resets" the collision if there's no collision anymore

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Collision

        public Collision()
        Create a "empty" collision, collision will be modify whenever a collision occurs

    • Method Detail

      • define

        public void define(simpleUIApp.Planet obs,
                   simpleUIApp.SpaceShip sp,
                   simpleUIApp.SpaceShip origin)
        define is called when there is a collision, setting type and direction of the collision
        Parameters:
        obs - - the planet obstacle ( the one in which the spaceship sp collides)
        sp - - the spaceship which is colliding the planet obstacle
        origin - - the spaceship right before the collision

      • handle

        public void handle(java.util.ArrayList<simpleUIApp.Planet> ListPlanets,
                   simpleUIApp.SpaceShip origin)
        handles collision, depending on its type and direction, and finally sets the spaceship origin to the new appropriated location it also "resets" the collision if there's no collision anymore
        Parameters:
        ListPlanets - - List of Planets on the Arena, need it to check for intersections
        origin - - SpaceShip to move

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        getType() is actually only used to check if the collision is "empty"
        Returns:
        the type of collision - "Horizontal" or "Vertical" , or "" if there is no collision
